sys_script_client.description: Approval Official DivisionLookupOnChange sets approve_official_division field to the value of the approve_official_division of the record selected in the Approval Official Division record, by the option selected in the Item Approval Official Division dropdown. If the Approval Official Divisionis not a null string, it is not set to the value of the lookup.
sys_script_client.name: Approval Official DivisionLookupOnChange
